ai-sn14:1.1.2_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:1.1.3_0: listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-sn14:1.2.1_0: “And what is the diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:1.2.2_0: The eye element, sight element, and eye consciousness element. The ear element, sound element, and ear consciousness element. The nose element, smell element, and nose consciousness element. The tongue element, taste element, and tongue consciousness element. The body element, touch element, and body consciousness element. The mind element, thought element, and mind consciousness element.
ai-sn14:1.2.3_0: This is called the diversity of elements.”
ai-sn14:1.2.4_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-sn14:2.1.2_0: “Mendicants, diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts.
ai-sn14:2.1.3_0: And what is the diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:2.1.4_0: The eye element, ear element, nose element, tongue element, body element, and mind element.
ai-sn14:2.1.5_0: This is called the diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:2.2.1_0: And how does diversity of elements give rise to diversity of contacts?
ai-sn14:2.2.2_0: The eye element gives rise to eye contact.
ai-sn14:2.2.7_0: The mind element gives rise to mind contact.
ai-sn14:2.2.8_0: That’s how diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts.”
ai-sn14:3.1.2_0: “Mendicants, diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts. Diversity of contacts doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:3.1.3_0: And what is the diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:3.1.4_0: The eye element, ear element, nose element, tongue element, body element, and mind element.
ai-sn14:3.1.6_0: This is called the diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:3.2.1_0: And how does diversity of elements give rise to diversity of contacts, while diversity of contacts doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:3.2.2_0: The eye element gives rise to eye contact. Eye contact doesn’t give rise to the eye element. ...
ai-sn14:3.2.3_0: The mind element gives rise to mind contact. Mind contact doesn’t give rise to the mind element.
ai-sn14:3.2.4_0: That’s how diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts, while diversity of contacts doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements.”
ai-sn14:4.1.2_0: “Mendicants, diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts, and diversity of contacts gives rise to diversity of feelings.
ai-sn14:4.1.3_0: And what is the diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:4.1.4_0: The eye element, ear element, nose element, tongue element, body element, and mind element.
ai-sn14:4.1.5_0: This is called the diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:4.2.1_0: And how does diversity of elements give rise to diversity of contacts, and diversity of contacts gives rise to diversity of feelings?
ai-sn14:4.2.2_0: The eye element gives rise to eye contact. Eye contact gives rise to the feeling born of eye contact. ...
ai-sn14:4.2.3_0: The mind element gives rise to mind contact. Mind contact gives rise to the feeling born of mind contact.
ai-sn14:4.2.4_0: That’s how diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts, and diversity of contacts gives rise to diversity of feelings.”
ai-sn14:5.1.2_0: “Mendicants, diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts. Diversity of contacts gives rise to diversity of feelings. Diversity of feelings doesn’t give rise to diversity of contacts. Diversity of contacts doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:5.1.3_0: And what is the diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:5.1.4_0: The eye element, ear element, nose element, tongue element, body element, and mind element.
ai-sn14:5.1.5_0: This is called the diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:5.2.1_0: And how does diversity of elements give rise to diversity of contacts, and diversity of contacts gives rise to diversity of feelings, while diversity of feelings doesn’t give rise to diversity of contacts, and diversity of contacts doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:5.2.2_0: The eye element gives rise to eye contact. Eye contact gives rise to feeling born of eye contact. Feeling born of eye contact doesn’t give rise to eye contact. Eye contact doesn’t give rise to the eye element. ...
ai-sn14:5.2.3_0: The mind element gives rise to mind contact. Mind contact gives rise to feeling born of mind contact. Feeling born of mind contact doesn’t give rise to mind contact. Mind contact doesn’t give rise to the mind element.
ai-sn14:5.2.4_0: That’s how diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts, and diversity of contacts gives rise to diversity of feelings, while diversity of feelings doesn’t give rise to diversity of contacts, and diversity of contacts doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements.”
ai-sn14:6.1.2_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:6.1.3_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-sn14:6.1.4_0: And what is the diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:6.1.5_0: The sight element, the sound element, the smell element, the taste element, the touch element, and the thought element.
ai-sn14:6.1.6_0: This is called the diversity of elements.”
ai-sn14:7.1.2_0: “Mendicants, diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of perceptions. Diversity of perceptions gives rise to diversity of intentions. Diversity of intentions gives rise to diversity of desires. Diversity of desires gives rise to diversity of passions. Diversity of passions gives rise to diversity of searches.
ai-sn14:7.1.3_0: And what is the diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:7.1.5_0: This is called the diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:7.2.1_0: And how does diversity of elements give rise to diversity of perceptions, and diversity of perceptions give rise to diversity of thoughts, and diversity of thoughts give rise to diversity of desires, and diversity of desires give rise to diversity of passions, and diversity of passions give rise to diversity of searches?
ai-sn14:7.3.1_0: The sight element gives rise to the perception of sights. The perception of sights gives rise to thoughts about sights. Thoughts about sights give rise to the desire for sights. The desire for sights gives rise to the passion for sights. The passion for sights gives rise to searching for sights. ...
ai-sn14:7.3.2_0: The thought element gives rise to the perception of thoughts. The perception of thoughts gives rise to thoughts about thoughts. Thoughts about thoughts give rise to the desire for thoughts. The desire for thoughts gives rise to the passion for thoughts. The passion for thoughts gives rise to searching for thoughts.
ai-sn14:7.4.1_0: That’s how diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of perceptions, and diversity of perceptions gives rise to diversity of intentions, and diversity of intentions gives rise to diversity of desires, and diversity of desires gives rise to diversity of passions, and diversity of passions gives rise to diversity of searches.”
ai-sn14:8.1.2_0: “Mendicants, diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of perceptions. Diversity of perceptions gives rise to diversity of intentions. Diversity of intentions gives rise to diversity of desires. Diversity of desires gives rise to diversity of passions. Diversity of passions gives rise to diversity of searches.
ai-sn14:8.1.3_0: Diversity of searches doesn’t give rise to diversity of passions. Diversity of passions doesn’t give rise to diversity of desires. Diversity of desires doesn’t give rise to diversity of thoughts. Diversity of thoughts doesn’t give rise to diversity of perceptions. Diversity of perceptions doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:8.1.4_0: And what is the diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:8.1.6_0: This is called the diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:8.2.1_0: And how does diversity of elements give rise to diversity of perceptions ...
ai-sn14:8.2.2_0: diversity of perceptions doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:8.3.1_0: The sight element gives rise to perceptions of sights. ...
ai-sn14:8.3.2_0: The thought element gives rise to the perception of thoughts ... the search for thoughts.
ai-sn14:8.3.3_0: The search for thoughts doesn’t give rise to the passion for thoughts. The passion for thoughts doesn’t give rise to the desire for thoughts. The desire for thoughts doesn’t give rise to thoughts about thoughts. Thoughts about thoughts don’t give rise to perceptions of thoughts. Perceptions of thoughts don’t give rise to the thought element.
ai-sn14:8.4.1_0: That’s how diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of perceptions ...
ai-sn14:8.4.2_0: diversity of perceptions doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements.”
ai-sn14:9.1.2_0: “Mendicants, diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of perceptions. Diversity of perceptions gives rise to diversity of intentions. Diversity of intentions gives rise to diversity of contacts. Diversity of contacts gives rise to diversity of feelings. Diversity of feelings gives rise to diversity of desires. Diversity of desires gives rise to diversity of passions. Diversity of passions gives rise to diversity of searches. Diversity of searches gives rise to diversity of gains.
ai-sn14:9.1.3_0: And what is the diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:9.1.5_0: This is called the diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:9.2.1_0: And how does diversity of elements give rise to diversity of perceptions ...
ai-sn14:9.2.1_1: What is a diversity of gains?
ai-sn14:9.3.1_0: The sight element gives rise to the perception of sights. The perception of sights gives rise to thoughts about sights. Thoughts about sights give rise to the desire for sights. The desire for sights gives rise to the passion for sights. The passion for sights gives rise to searching for sights. Searching for sights gives rise to gaining sights ...
ai-sn14:9.3.2_0: The thought element gives rise to the perception of thoughts. The perception of thoughts gives rise to thoughts about thoughts. Thoughts about thoughts give rise to the desire for thoughts. The desire for thoughts gives rise to the passion for thoughts. The passion for thoughts gives rise to searching for thoughts. Searching for thoughts gives rise to gaining thoughts.
ai-sn14:9.4.1_0: That’s how diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of perceptions ...
ai-sn14:9.4.1_1: Diversity of searches gives rise to diversity of gains.”
ai-sn14:10.0.3_0: Seventh: they wake upright and come to ruin.
ai-sn14:10.1.2_0: “Mendicants, diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of perceptions.
ai-sn14:10.1.3_0: Diversity of perceptions gives rise to diversity of thoughts. ...
ai-sn14:10.1.8_0: Diversity of searches gives rise to diversity of gains.
ai-sn14:10.1.9_0: Diversity of gains doesn’t give rise to diversity of searches.
ai-sn14:10.1.10_0: Diversity of searches doesn’t give rise to diversity of passions. ...
ai-sn14:10.1.15_0: Diversity of perceptions doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:10.1.16_0: And what is the diversity of elements?
ai-sn14:10.1.18_0: This is called the diversity of elements.
ai-sn14:10.2.1_0: And how does diversity of elements give rise to diversity of perceptions,
ai-sn14:10.2.2_0: and diversity of perceptions give rise to diversity of thoughts?
ai-sn14:10.2.9_0: Diversity of gains doesn’t give rise to diversity of searches.
ai-sn14:10.2.14_0: Diversity of perceptions doesn’t give rise to diversity of perceptions. ...
ai-sn14:10.3.1_0: The sight element gives rise to perceptions of sights. ...
ai-sn14:10.3.2_0: The thought element gives rise to the perception of thoughts ...
ai-sn14:10.3.3_0: The search for thoughts gives rise to gaining thoughts.
ai-sn14:10.3.4_0: The gaining of thoughts doesn’t give rise to the search for thoughts. The search for thoughts doesn’t give rise to the passion for thoughts. The passion for thoughts doesn’t give rise to the desire for thoughts. The desire for thoughts doesn’t give rise to thoughts about thoughts. Thoughts about thoughts don’t give rise to perceptions of thoughts. Perceptions of thoughts don’t give rise to the thought element.
ai-sn14:10.4.1_0: That’s how diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of perceptions ...
ai-sn14:10.4.9_0: diversity of perceptions doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements.”
ai-sn14:10.4.11_0: The first sub-chapter on diversity is finished.
ai-sn14:10.5.4_0: of the elements, or of light,
ai-sn14:11.1.4_0: The element of light, the element of beauty, the element of the dimension of infinite space, the element of the dimension of infinite consciousness, the element of the dimension of nothingness, the element of the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception, and the element of the cessation of perception and feeling.
ai-sn14:11.2.1_0: When this was said, one of the mendicants asked the Buddha,
ai-sn14:11.2.2_0: “Sir, due to what does each of these elements appear?”
ai-sn14:11.3.1_0: “Mendicant, the element of light appears due to the element of darkness.
ai-sn14:11.3.2_0: The element of beauty appears due to the element of ugliness.
ai-sn14:11.3.3_0: The element of the dimension of infinite space appears due to the element of form.
ai-sn14:11.3.4_0: The element of the dimension of infinite consciousness appears due to the element of the dimension of infinite space.
ai-sn14:11.3.5_0: The element of the dimension of nothingness appears due to the element of the dimension of infinite consciousness.
ai-sn14:11.3.6_0: The element of the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception appears due to the element of the dimension of nothingness.
ai-sn14:11.3.7_0: The element of the cessation of perception and feeling ceases.”
ai-sn14:11.4.1_0: “Sir, how is each of these elements to be attained?”
ai-sn14:11.5.1_0: “The elements of light, beauty, the dimension of infinite space, the dimension of infinite consciousness, and the dimension of nothingness are attainments with perception.
ai-sn14:11.5.2_0: The element of the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception is an attainment with only a residue of conditioned phenomena.
ai-sn14:11.5.3_0: The element of the cessation of perception and feeling is an attainment of cessation.”
ai-sn14:11.5.4_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-sn14:12.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sensual, malicious, and cruel thoughts arise for a reason, not without reason.
ai-sn14:12.1.2_2: cruelty arose in me, not without reason.
ai-sn14:12.2.1_0: And how do sensual thoughts arise for a reason, not without reason?
ai-sn14:12.2.1_2: Does cruelty arise for a reason, not without reason?
ai-sn14:12.2.2_0: The element of sensuality gives rise to sensual perceptions. Sensual perceptions give rise to sensual thoughts. Sensual thoughts give rise to sensual desires. Sensual desires give rise to sensual passions. Sensual passions give rise to searches for sensual pleasures.
ai-sn14:12.2.3_0: An uneducated ordinary person on a search for sensual pleasures behaves badly in three ways: by body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn14:12.3.1_0: The element of malice gives rise to malicious perceptions. Malicious perceptions give rise to malicious thoughts. ...
ai-sn14:12.3.2_0: An uneducated ordinary person on a malicious search behaves badly in three ways: by body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn14:12.4.1_0: The element of cruelty gives rise to cruel perceptions.
ai-sn14:12.4.1_1: cruel thoughts give rise to cruel thoughts. ...
ai-sn14:12.4.2_0: An uneducated ordinary person on a cruel search behaves badly in three ways: by body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn14:12.5.1_0: Suppose a person was to drop a burning torch in a thicket of dry grass.
ai-sn14:12.5.1_1: If they don’t quickly extinguish it with their hands and feet,
ai-sn14:12.5.1_2: If they don’t quickly extinguish it with their hands and feet, the creatures living in the grass and wood would come to ruin.
ai-sn14:12.5.2_0: In the same way, a corrupt perception might arise in an ascetic or brahmin. If they don’t quickly give it up, get rid of it, eliminate it, and obliterate it, they’ll suffer in the present life, with anguish, distress, and fever.
ai-sn14:12.5.3_0: And when the body breaks up, after death, they can expect to be reborn in a bad place.
ai-sn14:12.6.1_1: Thoughts of good will, not without reason.
ai-sn14:12.6.1_2: thoughts of harmlessness, not without reason.
ai-sn14:12.7.1_0: And how do thoughts of renunciation arise for a reason, not without reason?
ai-sn14:12.7.1_1: Thoughts of good will, not without reason.
ai-sn14:12.7.1_2: and harmlessness arise for a reason, not without reason?
ai-sn14:12.7.2_0: The element of renunciation gives rise to perceptions of renunciation.
ai-sn14:12.7.3_0: Perceptions of renunciation give rise to thoughts of renunciation.
ai-sn14:12.7.4_0: Thoughts of renunciation give rise to enthusiasm for renunciation.
ai-sn14:12.7.5_0: Enthusiasm for renunciation gives rise to fervor for renunciation.
ai-sn14:12.7.6_0: Fervor for renunciation gives rise to the search for renunciation.
ai-sn14:12.7.7_0: An educated noble disciple on a search for renunciation behaves well in three ways: by body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn14:12.8.1_0: The element of good will gives rise to perceptions of good will.
ai-sn14:12.8.2_0: Perceptions of good will give rise to thoughts of good will. ...
ai-sn14:12.8.6_0: An educated noble disciple on a search for good will behaves well in three ways: by body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn14:12.9.1_0: The element of harmlessness gives rise to harmlessness perceptions.
ai-sn14:12.9.2_0: Harmlessness perceptions give rise to harmlessness thoughts. ...
ai-sn14:12.9.6_0: An educated noble disciple on a search for harmlessness behaves well in three ways: by body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn14:12.10.1_0: Suppose a person was to drop a burning torch in a thicket of dry grass.
ai-sn14:12.10.1_1: Then they quickly extinguish it with their hands and feet.
ai-sn14:12.10.1_2: If they were to quickly extinguish it with their hands and feet, the creatures living in the grass and wood wouldn’t come to ruin.
ai-sn14:12.10.2_0: In the same way, a corrupt perception might arise in an ascetic or brahmin. If they quickly give it up, get rid of it, eliminate it, and obliterate it, they’ll be happy in the present life, free of anguish, distress, and fever.
ai-sn14:12.10.3_0: And when the body breaks up, after death, they can expect to be reborn in a good place.”
ai-sn14:13.1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Nādika in the brick house.
ai-sn14:13.2.1_0: “Mendicants, an element gives rise to a perception, a view, and a thought.”
ai-sn14:13.2.2_0: When he said this, Venerable Kaccāna said to the Buddha,
ai-sn14:13.2.4_0: those who are not fully awakened Buddhas, there is a view that they are in fact fully awakened Buddhas. Due to what does this view appear?”
ai-sn14:13.3.1_0: “It’s a mighty thing, Kaccāna, the element of ignorance.
ai-sn14:13.3.2_0: An inferior element gives rise to inferior perceptions, inferior views, inferior thoughts, inferior intentions, inferior aims, inferior wishes, an inferior person, and inferior speech.
ai-sn14:13.3.3_0: One explains, teaches, asserts, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals the inferior.
ai-sn14:13.3.4_0: I say that their rebirth is inferior.
ai-sn14:13.4.1_0: A middling element gives rise to middling perceptions, middling views, middling thoughts, middling intentions, middling aims, middling wishes, a middling person, and middling speech.
ai-sn14:13.4.2_0: One explains, teaches, asserts, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals the middling.
ai-sn14:13.4.3_0: I say that their rebirth is middling.
ai-sn14:13.5.1_0: A superior element gives rise to superior perceptions, superior views, superior thoughts, superior intentions, superior aims, superior wishes, a superior person, and superior speech.
ai-sn14:13.5.2_0: One explains, teaches, asserts, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals the superior.
ai-sn14:13.5.3_0: I say that their rebirth is superior.”
ai-sn14:14.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:14.1.4_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-sn14:14.2.2_0: what is low to one who has bonds come together,
ai-sn14:14.2.3_0: Those who have good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-sn14:14.3.3_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-sn14:14.4.1_0: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element. ...”
ai-sn14:14.4.3_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.”
ai-sn14:15.1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, on the Vulture’s Peak Mountain.
ai-sn14:15.1.2_0: Now at that time Venerable Sāriputta was walking together with several mendicants not far from the Buddha.
ai-sn14:15.1.3_0: Venerable Mahāmoggallāna was doing likewise, as were
ai-sn14:15.2.1_0: The Buddha said to the mendicants,
ai-sn14:15.2.2_0: “Mendicants, do you see Sāriputta walking together with several mendicants?”
ai-sn14:15.2.4_0: “All of those mendicants have great wisdom.
ai-sn14:15.2.5_0: Do you see Moggallāna walking together with several mendicants?”
ai-sn14:15.2.7_0: “All of those mendicants have great psychic power.
ai-sn14:15.2.8_0: Do you see Kassapa walking together with several mendicants?”
ai-sn14:15.2.11_0: Do you see Anuruddha walking together with several mendicants?”
ai-sn14:15.2.14_0: Do you see Puṇṇa Mantāniputta walking together with several mendicants?”
ai-sn14:15.2.16_0: “All of those mendicants are Dhamma speakers.
ai-sn14:15.2.17_0: Do you see Upāli walking together with several mendicants?”
ai-sn14:15.2.19_0: “All of those mendicants are experts in monastic training.
ai-sn14:15.2.20_0: Do you see Ānanda walking together with several mendicants?”
ai-sn14:15.2.22_0: “All of those mendicants are very learned.
ai-sn14:15.2.23_0: Do you see Devadatta walking together with several mendicants?”
ai-sn14:15.2.25_0: “All of those mendicants have wicked desires.
ai-sn14:15.3.1_0: sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:15.3.3_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-sn14:15.3.5_0: what is low to one who has bonds come together,
ai-sn14:15.3.6_0: Those who have good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-sn14:15.4.3_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-sn14:15.5.1_0: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element. ...”
ai-sn14:15.5.3_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.”
ai-sn14:16.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:16.1.5_0: one who is low, some low, and converge with them.
ai-sn14:16.2.2_0: we’re low, crude, and converge with you.
ai-sn14:16.3.1_0: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element. ...”
ai-sn14:16.4.1_0: It’s like how dung comes together with dung,
ai-sn14:16.4.6_0: In the same way, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:16.4.10_0: and also in the present, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
ai-sn14:16.5.1_0: sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:16.5.2_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-sn14:16.5.4_0: Those who have good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-sn14:16.6.2_0: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element. ...”
ai-sn14:16.6.3_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-sn14:16.7.1_0: It’s like how milk comes together with milk,
ai-sn14:16.7.6_0: In the same way, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:16.7.7_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-sn14:16.7.10_0: and also in the present, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
ai-sn14:16.7.11_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.”
ai-sn14:16.8.1_0: This is what the Buddha said.
ai-sn14:16.8.2_0: Then the Holy One, the Teacher, went on to say:
ai-sn14:16.9.3_0: If only a little bit of wood,
ai-sn14:16.10.1_0: So too, go to the lazy
ai-sn14:16.10.2_0: sinks by relying on a lazy person.
ai-sn14:17.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:17.1.9_0: and the witless with the witless.
ai-sn14:17.4.1_0: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element. ...”
ai-sn14:17.4.8_0: and the witless with the witless.
ai-sn14:17.5.1_0: sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:17.5.8_0: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:17.5.11_0: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element. ...”
ai-sn14:17.5.13_0: and the wise with the wise.”
ai-sn14:18.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:18.1.8_0: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:18.2.1_0: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element. ...”
ai-sn14:18.2.6_0: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:18.3.1_0: sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:18.3.7_0: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:18.3.8_0: (The following should be expanded like the first section.)
ai-sn14:18.4.1_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:18.5.1_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:18.5.6_1: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:18.6.1_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:18.6.6_1: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:19.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:20.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:20.1.7_1: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:20.2.5_1: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:20.3.5_1: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:21.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:21.1.7_1: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:21.2.5_1: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:22.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:22.1.7_1: and the wise with the wise.
ai-sn14:22.1.9_0: (This should be expanded in the past.)
ai-sn14:22.2.1_0: a hundred on account of the good,
ai-sn14:22.2.3_0: they walk up and down to the lesser,
ai-sn14:22.2.4_0: had an faithless one who was faithless.
ai-sn14:22.4.3_0: The twenty-four items have been stated,
ai-sn14:22.4.4_0: it is said to be the second
ai-sn14:23.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:23.1.7_0: and the witless with the witless.
ai-sn14:23.2.5_0: and the wise with the wise.”
ai-sn14:23.2.6_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-sn14:24.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:24.1.7_0: and the witless with the witless.
ai-sn14:24.2.4_0: the ethical with the ethical conduct ...
ai-sn14:24.2.5_0: and the wise with the wise.”
ai-sn14:25.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:25.1.7_0: consume alcoholic drinks that cause negligence ...
ai-sn14:25.2.1_0: who refrain from killing living creatures ...
ai-sn14:25.2.5_0: those who refrain from consuming alcoholic drinks that cause negligence with those who refrain from consuming alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.”
ai-sn14:26.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:26.2.1_0: Those who refrain from killing living creatures. ...
ai-sn14:26.2.7_0: who refrain from talking nonsense with those who refrain from talking nonsense.”
ai-sn14:27.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:27.2.1_0: who refrain from killing living creatures ...
ai-sn14:27.2.10_0: have right view with those who have right view.”
ai-sn14:28.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:28.2.8_0: right immersion with those who have right immersion.”
ai-sn14:29.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-sn14:29.2.10_0: right freedom with those who have right freedom.”
ai-sn14:29.2.12_0: (This should be expanded in the past.)
ai-sn14:29.3.5_0: The sixth section on the eightfold path
ai-sn14:29.3.7_0: The third sub-chapter on deeds is finished.
ai-sn14:30.1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-sn14:30.1.4_0: The elements of earth, water, fire, and air.
ai-sn14:30.1.6_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-sn14:31.1.2_0: “Mendicants, before my awakening—when I was still unawakened but intent on awakening—I thought:
ai-sn14:31.1.3_0: ‘What’s the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to the earth element ...
ai-sn14:31.2.2_0: ‘The pleasure and happiness that arise from the earth element: this is its gratification.
ai-sn14:31.2.3_0: That the earth element is impermanent, suffering, and perishable: this is its drawback.
ai-sn14:31.2.4_0: Removing and giving up desire and greed for the earth element: this is its escape.
ai-sn14:31.2.5_0: The pleasure and happiness that arise from the water element ...
ai-sn14:31.2.6_0: The pleasure and happiness that arise from the fire element ...
ai-sn14:31.2.7_0: The pleasure and happiness that arise from the air element: this is its gratification.
ai-sn14:31.2.8_0: That the air element is impermanent, suffering, and perishable: this is its drawback.
ai-sn14:31.2.9_0: Removing and giving up desire and greed for the air element: this is its escape.
ai-sn14:31.3.1_0: As long as I didn’t truly understand these four elements’ gratification, drawback, and escape in this way for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
ai-sn14:31.4.1_0: But when I did truly understand these four elements’ gratification, drawback, and escape in this way for what they are, I announced my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
ai-sn14:31.4.2_0: Knowledge and vision arose in me:
ai-sn14:31.4.3_0: ‘My freedom is unshakable; this is my last rebirth; now there’ll be no more future lives.’”
ai-sn14:32.1.2_0: “Mendicants, I went in search of the earth element’s gratification, and I found it. I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of gratification in the earth element.
ai-sn14:32.1.3_0: I went in search of the earth element’s drawback, and I found it. I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the drawback in the earth element.
ai-sn14:32.1.4_0: I went in search of escape from the earth element’s escape, and I found it. And I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of escape from the earth element.
ai-sn14:32.2.1_0: I went in search of the water element’s gratification ...
ai-sn14:32.2.2_0: I went in search of the fire element’s gratification ...
ai-sn14:32.2.3_0: I went in search of the air element’s gratification ...
ai-sn14:32.2.4_0: I went in search of the air element’s drawback, and I found it. I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the drawback in the air element.
ai-sn14:32.2.5_0: I went in search of escape from the air element’s escape, and I found it. I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of escape from the air element.
ai-sn14:32.3.1_0: As long as I didn’t truly understand these four elements’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
ai-sn14:32.4.1_0: But when I did truly understand the four elements’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I announced my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
ai-sn14:32.4.2_0: Knowledge and vision arose in me:
ai-sn14:32.4.3_0: ‘My freedom is unshakable; this is my last rebirth; now there’ll be no more future lives.’”
ai-sn14:33.1.2_0: “Mendicants, if there were no gratification in the earth element, sentient beings wouldn’t love it.
ai-sn14:33.1.3_0: But since there is gratification in the earth element, sentient beings do love it.
ai-sn14:33.1.4_0: If the earth element had no drawback, sentient beings wouldn’t grow disillusioned with it.
ai-sn14:33.1.5_0: But since the earth element has a drawback, sentient beings do grow disillusioned with it.
ai-sn14:33.1.6_0: If there were no escape from the earth element, sentient beings wouldn’t escape from it.
ai-sn14:33.1.7_0: But since there is an escape from the earth element, sentient beings do escape from it.
ai-sn14:33.2.1_0: If there were no gratification in the water element ...
ai-sn14:33.2.2_0: If there were no gratification in the fire element ...
ai-sn14:33.2.3_0: If there were no gratification in the air element ...
ai-sn14:33.2.4_0: But since there is gratification in the air element, sentient beings do love it.
ai-sn14:33.2.5_0: If the air element had no drawback, sentient beings wouldn’t grow disillusioned with it.
ai-sn14:33.2.6_0: But since the air element has a drawback, sentient beings do grow disillusioned with it.
ai-sn14:33.2.7_0: If there were no escape from the air element, sentient beings wouldn’t escape from it.
ai-sn14:33.2.8_0: But since there is an escape from the air element, sentient beings do escape from it.
ai-sn14:33.3.1_0: As long as sentient beings don’t truly understand these four elements’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, they haven’t escaped from this world—with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans—and they don’t live detached, liberated, with a mind free of limits.
ai-sn14:33.4.1_0: But when sentient beings truly understand these four elements’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, they’ve escaped from this world—with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans—and they live detached, liberated, with a mind free of limits.”
ai-sn14:34.1.2_0: “Mendicants, if the earth element were exclusively painful—soaked and steeped in pain and not steeped in pleasure—sentient beings wouldn’t love it.
ai-sn14:34.1.3_0: But because the earth element is pleasurable—soaked and steeped in pleasure and not steeped in pain—sentient beings do love it.
ai-sn14:34.2.4_0: But because the air element is pleasurable—soaked and steeped in pleasure and not steeped in pain—sentient beings do love it.
ai-sn14:34.3.1_0: If the earth element were exclusively pleasurable—soaked and steeped in pleasure and not steeped in pain—sentient beings wouldn’t grow disillusioned with it.
ai-sn14:34.3.2_0: But because the earth element is painful—soaked and steeped in pain and not steeped in pleasure—sentient beings do grow disillusioned with it.
ai-sn14:34.4.3_0: If the air element were exclusively pleasurable—soaked and steeped in pleasure and not steeped in pain—sentient beings wouldn’t grow disillusioned with it.
ai-sn14:34.4.4_0: But because the air element is painful—soaked and steeped in pain and not steeped in pleasure—sentient beings do grow disillusioned with it.”
ai-sn14:35.1.2_0: “Mendicants, if you take pleasure in the earth element, you take pleasure in suffering.
ai-sn14:35.1.3_0: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering. ...”
ai-sn14:35.1.4_0: If you take pleasure in the water element ...
ai-sn14:35.1.5_0: If you take pleasure in the fire element ...
ai-sn14:35.1.6_0: If you take pleasure in the air element, you take pleasure in suffering.
ai-sn14:35.1.7_0: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering. ...”
ai-sn14:35.2.1_0: If you don’t take pleasure in the earth element, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.
ai-sn14:35.2.2_0: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering. ...”
ai-sn14:35.2.3_0: If you don’t take pleasure in the water element ...
ai-sn14:35.2.4_0: If you take pleasure in the fire element ...
ai-sn14:35.2.5_0: If you don’t take pleasure in the air element, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.
ai-sn14:35.2.6_0: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.”
ai-sn14:36.1.2_0: “Mendicants, the arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the earth element is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
ai-sn14:36.1.3_0: The cessation, settling, and ending of the water element ...
ai-sn14:36.1.4_0: The cessation, settling, and ending of the fire element ...
ai-sn14:36.1.5_0: The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the air element is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
ai-sn14:36.2.1_0: The cessation, settling, and ending of the earth element is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.
ai-sn14:36.2.2_0: The cessation, settling, and ending of the water element ...
ai-sn14:36.2.3_0: The cessation, settling, and ending of the fire element ...
ai-sn14:36.2.4_0: The cessation, settling, and ending of the air element is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.”
ai-sn14:37.1.5_0: There are ascetics and brahmins who don’t truly understand these four elements’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are.
ai-sn14:37.1.6_0: I don’t regard them as true ascetics and brahmins.
ai-sn14:37.1.6_1: Those venerables don’t realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin, and don’t live having realized it with their own insight.
ai-sn14:37.2.1_0: There are ascetics and brahmins who do truly understand these four elements’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are.
ai-sn14:37.2.2_0: I regard them as true ascetics and brahmins.
ai-sn14:37.2.2_1: Those venerables realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin, and live having realized it with their own insight.”
ai-sn14:38.1.5_0: There are ascetics and brahmins who don’t truly understand these four elements’ origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape ...
ai-sn14:38.1.6_0: There are ascetics and brahmins who do truly understand these four elements’ origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape ...”
ai-sn14:38.1.7_0: There are ascetics and brahmins who do truly understand ...”
ai-sn14:39.0.3_0: Third: there are ascetics and brahmins.
ai-sn14:39.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are ascetics and brahmins who don’t understand the earth element, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation.
ai-sn14:39.1.3_0: They don’t understand the water element ...
ai-sn14:39.1.6_0: Those venerables don’t realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin, and don’t live having realized it with their own insight.
ai-sn14:39.2.1_0: There are ascetics and brahmins who do understand the earth element, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation.
ai-sn14:39.2.2_0: They do understand the water element ...
ai-sn14:39.2.5_0: Those venerables realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin, and live having realized it with their own insight.”
ai-sn14:39.3.1_0: I used to have four classes,
ai-sn14:39.3.5_0: The Linked Discourses on the elements are complete.
